about_the_game:
A blood-soaked Action RPG dungeon crawler where death is never the end.

Massacre endless hordes of genetic nightmares, absorb their blood to inherit their abilities, and never stop moving—because in this world, the dead don’t stay dead. Fight, evolve, and uncover the secret of eternal life.

Create the genetic nightmare of your dreams

Mix and match from 13+ Horrors to build a monstrosity with over 200,000 biological permutations. Each limb grants a unique ability and playstyle—experiment, adapt, and evolve as you carve your way through the ever-changing horrors ahead.

Never stop moving. Never stop killing.

Heredity’s relentless push-forward gameplay forces you to keep the massacre going. Stop, and the fallen will rise again—stronger than before. Want to stand your ground? The rewards might be worth the risk… if you can survive. But remember: the horde always wins in the end.

Will greed be your undoing?

Explore a world that evolves with blood

The influence of fallen Horrors mutates the land itself. Terrain, vegetation, and enemies change based on the blood spilled upon them. Study your surroundings to anticipate the dangers ahead—and use them to your advantage.

Seek answers in a world where death is an illusion

Step into the shoes of a disoriented youngling trapped in a world where death is temporary, and murder is a pastime. Unravel the secrets of this twisted realm, and perhaps, if you conquer the horrors within, you'll find meaning in an existence without end.

Join us on Discord

Be part of the Heredity community! Get an inside look at development, share your thoughts, and help shape the future of the game.
